text: Arie Slob (born November 16, 1961 in Nieuwerkerk aan den IJssel) is a Dutch politician of the ChristianUnion (CU). Slob studied history and went into politics, first on behalf of the Reformed Political Alliance (GPV), later on of its successor the ChristianUnion. Slob was a councillor of Zwolle and a member of the House of Representatives. From 2017 to 2022, he was minister for education for children and teenagers in the Third Rutte cabinet. == References == * Parlement.com Category:1961 births Category:Living people Category:Christian Union politicians Category:Dutch Calvinists Category:Dutch councillors Category:Leaders of political parties in the Netherlands Category:Members of the House of Representatives of the Netherlands Category:Government ministers of the Netherlands Category:Politicians from South Holland
title: Arie Slob
